verses.verse: Do not <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with <S%H1524>exultation<s%> like the <S%H5971>nations!<s%> For you have <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H4480>forsaking<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You have <S%H157>loved<s%> [harlots'] <S%H868>earnings<s%> on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor.<s%>
<S%H1637>Threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> and <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>press<s%> will not <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, And the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> will <S%H3584>fail<s%> them.

They will not <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the Lord's <S%H776>land,<s%> But <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And in <S%H804>Assyria<s%> they will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> [food.]

They will not <S%H5258>pour<s%> out <S%H5258>libations<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> will not <S%H6149>please<s%> Him. [Their <S%H3899>bread<s%> will be] like mourners' <S%H3899>bread;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H398>eat<s%> of it will be <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> For their bread will be for <S%H5315>themselves<s%> [alone]; It will not <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>festival<s%> And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?

For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H7701>destruction;<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them up, <S%H4644>Memphis<s%> will <S%H6912>bury<s%> them. <S%H7057>Weeds<s%> will <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>over<s%> their <S%H4261>treasures<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H2336>Thorns<s%> [will be] in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6486>punishment<s%> have <S%H935>come,<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7966>retribution<s%> have <S%H935>come;<s%> Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> [this]! The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> is a <S%H191>fool,<s%> The <S%H7307>inspired<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7696>demented,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> of the <S%H7230>grossness<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And [because] your <S%H4895>hostility<s%> is [so] <S%H7227>great.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> [was] a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> with my <S%H430>God,<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> [Yet] the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of a <S%H3352>bird<s%> <S%H3352>catcher<s%> is in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> [And] there is [only] <S%H4895>hostility<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>

They have <S%H6009>gone<s%> <S%H6009>deep<s%> in <S%H7843>depravity<s%> As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah;<s%> He will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> He will <S%H6485>punish<s%> their <S%H9128>sins.<s%>

I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like <S%H6025>grapes<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> your forefathers as the <S%H1>earliest<s%> <S%H1063>fruit<s%> on the <S%H1063>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree<s%> in its <S%H8384>first<s%> [season.] [But] they <S%H7225>came<s%> to Baal-peor and <S%H935>devoted<s%> themselves to <S%H5144>shame,<s%> And they <S%H1322>became<s%> as <S%H1961>detestable<s%> as that <S%H8251>which<s%> they <S%H159>loved.<s%>

As for <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> their <S%H9202>glory<s%> will <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H5774>away<s%> like a <S%H5775>bird<s%> – <S%H4480>No<s%> <S%H3205>birth,<s%> <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H990>pregnancy,<s%> and <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H2032>conception!<s%>

<S%H3588>Though<s%> <S%H518><s%> they <S%H1431>bring<s%> up their <S%H1121>children,<s%> Yet I will <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them until not a <S%H120>man<s%> is left. <S%H3588>Yes,<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> to them <S%H1571>indeed<s%> when I <S%H5493>depart<s%> from them!

<S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> as I have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> Is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a pleasant <S%H5116>meadow<s%> like <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%> But <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will <S%H3318>bring<s%> out his <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H2026>slaughter.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> them, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> – <S%H4100>what<s%> wilt Thou <S%H5414>give<s%>? <S%H5414>Give<s%> them a <S%H7921>miscarrying<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%> and <S%H6784>dry<s%> <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H9567>evil<s%> is at <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> I came to <S%H8130>hate<s%> them <S%H8033>there!<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> of the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H4611>deeds<s%> I will <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out of My <S%H1004>house!<s%> I will <S%H157>love<s%> them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>rebels.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H5221>stricken,<s%> their <S%H8328>root<s%> is <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, They will <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H6529>fruit.<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they <S%H3205>bear<s%> children, I will <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H4261>precious<s%> <S%H4261>ones<s%> of their <S%H990>womb.<s%>

My <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3988>cast<s%> them <S%H3988>away<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to Him; And they will be <S%H5074>wanderers<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
